thread.title: Destiny: The Taken King English and Japanese Live Action Videos Out Now
thread.title_full: Destiny: The Taken King English and Japanese Live Action Videos Out Now - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Destiny: The Taken King English and Japanese Live Action Videos Out Now
text: Bungie has released two different live action commercials for its upcoming The Taken King expansion for Destiny , promoting it for English-speaking regions but also in Japan. Both ads are quite intense, although the Japanese one is more tongue-in-cheek. Destiny is set to receive its biggest expansion yet, in the form of The Taken King, next week on September 15 across PS4, PS3, Xbox One, and Xbox 360. As expected, developer Bungie is hyping up the debut of the add-on in all ... Â»
